Package controller

package controller
Provides Controller classes as part of Model-View-Controller (MVC).

Relies on JavaFX to display and manipulate the GUI.

If you use this software, please cite it as indicated in the CITATION.cff file.

Link to JavaFX documentation:
javafx-graphics 17.0.1 javadoc

  • Class
    Description
    AppointmentController
    Controller for the add or modify Appointment form.
    AuthenticatedController
    Interface for controllers that make use of a user object for authenticated access.
    CustomerController
    Controller for the add or modify Customer form.
    CustomersReportController
    Controller for the Custom Report (customer total by country).
    LoginController
    The Controller class for the login window.
    PrimaryController
    Controller for the main menu.
    ScheduleReportController
    Controller for the Contacts Schedule reports screen.
    TotalsReportController
    Controller for the Appointment-totals Report.
